thread.title: Ariana Grande Teases Music Video for Andrea Bocelli Duet 'E Piu Ti Penso'
thread.title_full: Ariana Grande Teases Music Video for Andrea Bocelli Duet 'E Piu Ti Penso'

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Ariana Grande Teases Music Video for Andrea Bocelli Duet 'E Piu Ti Penso'
text:
Comments In the snippet Grande shared on her Facebook page, she and Bocelli were seen singing the ballad superimposed over a city background. 
Ariana Grande took to Facebook over the weekend to tease the music video for her duet with music star Andrea Bocelli titled "E Piu Ti Penso". The song originates from 1984 film "Once Upon A Time In America" and is featured on the Italian tenor's latest LP " Cinema ". In the snippet, Grande and Bocelli could be seen performing the ballad superimposed over a city background. The video is set to be dropped on VEVO next Tuesday, October 13. 
The music video for 'E Piu Te Penso' with Andrea Bocelli comes out next Tuesday Oct 13th on Vevo! Spotify: http://po.st/AGEPiuTePensoSpIG iTunes: http://po.st/AGEPiuTePensoFB<3 Team Ariana Posted by Ariana Grande on Friday, October 9, 2015 Grande has previously been quoted as saying about the duet, "To have a record with Andrea is just so surreal and so special, and something that I never thought would happen." She then excitedly added, "I'm so grateful. He's Andrea Bocelli." "E Piu Ti Penso" was released last week. Earlier this week, the single successfully topped the Billboard Classical Songs Chart. In further Grande's news, the songstress would be releasing her new single "Focus" on October 30. The upcoming track is set to be featured as the lead single of her third album, " Moonlight ".
